How do I send VRSCTEST to another user, alice@, and convert it to a new coin called NEWCOIN using the command line?

To send VRSCTEST to another user, alice@, and convert it to a new coin called NEWCOIN, you can use the following command:
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"alice@","amount":10, "convertto":"NEWCOIN", "preconvert":true, "refundto":"alice@"}]'
```
This command sends 10 units of VRSCTEST to alice@ and converts it to NEWCOIN. If the conversion is not possible, the original amount will be refunded to alice@.
